Class EclipseUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • review.classdesign.jammy.common.EclipseUtils

  • public final class EclipseUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Toolbox class that contains helpful method for dealing with Eclipse workbench features.
    Author:
    fv
